## Tools.swc property

The [Tools.swc](./rspeedy.tools.swc.md) controls the options of [builtin:swc-loader](https://rspack.dev/guide/features/builtin-swc-loader)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
swc?: ToolsConfig['swc'] | undefined;
```
